subject: Mitchell Report (Baseball)
Steroids
Perjury
Human Growth Hormone
organizations: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
lead_paragraph: A high-profile lawyer said a flaw was created in the government’s perjury case against the pitcher because Congress may have overstepped its boundaries.
snippet: A high-profile lawyer said a flaw was created in the government’s perjury case against the pitcher because Congress may have overstepped its boundaries.
